# isOrdered

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the relationship preserves the order of the referenced managed objects.

## Declaration

```swift
var isOrdered: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Configuring the Destination

- **inverseRelationship**: The relationship that represents the inverse of the current relationship.
- **destinationEntity**: The type of object the relationship contains.
